title: Is there any music Eminem has recorded and put away? - Quora

response.answer_text: I assume by “put away” that you mean “locked in the vault”. Sure he has. Plenty of songs in fact. Em, has recorded a lot of songs that have never been released to the public, for Relapse, he recorded so many songs that he decided he was going to make a Relapse 2 so he could put the remaining songs on the second CD. He never did of course, he worked on Recovery and I assume through leaks and stuff of his “King Mathers” - Relapse era songs that are on YouTube that he has plenty more recorded that he has never released. Source: Big Eminem fan
